This technique creates a flammable black mist that forms a small cloud. The user can then move the cloud above their target and disperse it, covering the target in flammable oil. This technique was first used to burn down [[Idate Morino]]'s boat, after it was lit with fire.

== Trivia ==
* Although an anime-only technique, it is similar to [[Amaterasu]] and [[Black Lightning]], as it is also a black-coloured elemental technique.
